name: Glittermitten Grove
description: Just like the faeries in your garden, we love collecting berries for our prickleberry loaves and finding treasure with our special fribblesham fireworks. Come join us in our faerieland, full of strange adventure!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual Core 2+ ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000, GeForce 8600, Radeon HD 3650 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 768 MB available space
